synopsis.text:
Takemoto Takeru, a typical high school student turned part-time bike courier, finds his mundane life taking a dramatic turn when he stumbles upon a peculiar light during a delivery. Following the light, he discovers a captivating girl named Hikari emerging from a radiant cocoon in the forest. Before he can fully grasp the situation, a menacing monster appears, attacking both Hikari and Takeru. In the heat of the moment, Takeru uncovers hidden powers within himself to protect Hikari.

As Takeru delves deeper into the mystery surrounding Hikari and another enigmatic girl named Akari, he embarks on an exhilarating journey filled with action, humor, and romance alongside his childhood friend, Mari, and his classmates. While trying to unravel the secrets of these strange girls and their connection to Earth, Takeru grapples with the complexities of the world's beauty and ugliness.

As the story unfolds, the line between the ideal and reality blurs, and Takeru and his friends are faced with the secrets of global extinction and the true meaning of life. This gentle and romantic tale explores the intricate balance between beauty and ugliness, demonstrating that even in the darkest of times, love and friendship can prevail.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
